Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: .Located just off Highway 14 in Fort Collins with a quick and easy access to I-25

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
This unique property is a 32,870+SF multi-sport facility in an excellent location at the intersection of I-25 and Mulberry in Fort Collins. The facility offers great features for commercial and light industrial/office use including 20 ft clear height with a 30 ft center height, clear span, 8” concrete insulated walls, T5 lighting and a full sprinkler system.

This facility is ideal for and currently being used as a multi-use, indoor sports field complex.
The 22,000 SF synthetic turf playing field* can be used for multiple sports with an additional ±11,000 SF area that includes batting cages, a workout room, pro shop and conference room. The property has an asphalt parking lot with a total of 82 spaces.
*Playing field, equipment, fixtures and personal property sold separately.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: This unique property is a 32,870+ SF multi-sport facility in an excellent location at the intersection of I-25 and Mulberry Street in Fort Collins. The facility offers great features for commercial and light industrial/office use including 20 foot clear height with a 30 foot center height, 8" concrete insulated walls, T5 lighting and a full sprinkler system.

Easy access to I-25 and Hwy 287

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: This property is well located in Loveland, Colorado just off Highway 34 (E. Eisenhower Blvd.) and minutes from I-25 and Hwy 287.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 2 shipping docks on east side with truck restraints

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in High Ground Industrial Park, Lot 2 in Berthoud, Colorado with easy access to Hwy 287 and I-25. Berthoud is located just 10 minutes from Loveland and 40 minutes from Fort Collins, Colorado.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This available property is a 28,355 SF Industrial Warehouse with asphalt paved yard space. Many tenant improvements are in place including a sprinkler system installed throughout the entire building with a flow rate of 0.7 GPM per 2500 SF. On the east side of the building are 2 shipping docks with truck restraints, safety lights, and dock door bumper seals.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: 5.41 acres of unimproved land on the full-movement lighted intersection at 10035 Federal Drive and Voyager Parkway.
Distribution warehouse building measuring 44,097 SF on 4.15 acres accessed form Federal drive. Potential for increased access from Old Ranch Road.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: PARCEL 1 - LAND Parcel #6229000003 - 5.41 acres of unimproved land on the full-movement lighted intersection at 10035 Federal Drive and Voyager Parkway.
PARCEL 2 - 10035 Federal Drive  Parcel #6229013002 - Distribution warehouse building measuring 44,097 SF on 4.15 acres accessed form Federal drive. Potential for increased access from Old Ranch Road.

Built in 2006 for a user/owner distribution company, the building consists of 72% warehouse space and was designed for expansion of an additional 20,000 SF of high bay warehouse and 2,000 SF of office space. Well-appointed office space is on the mezzanine level, with outstanding views of the Front Range and Air Force Academy to the west.

The warehouse offers 32-foot clear height and clear span, with six dock-high overhead doors and one drive-in overhead door with great truck/loading access. The warehouse offers an excellent racking system for stacking up to 30 feet that can be conveyed with the property. Sprinklered, PIP-1 zoning, stucco and tilt-up construction.
The building was also designed for possible conversion to two-story office space. Original building plans can be provided.

A lease is currently in place offering immediate income to Buyer. Landlord and Tenant have the mutual option to terminate the lease with six (6) months’ written notice to the other party. Lease and proforma available for review with a signed NDA.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Full-movement lighted intersection at 10035 Federal Drive and Voyager Parkway.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Building consists of 72% warehouse space and was designed for expansion of an additional 20,000 SF of high bay warehouse and 2,000 SF of office space. Well-appointed office space is on the mezzanine level.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 44,097 SF Warehouse/Distribution/Office Building on 4.15 AC & 5.41 AC Land
